data.name: OrderStatusSubject
data.value: Quaffee Order Status Update

data.name: RepairStatusEmailBody
data.value:
Dear {0},

We wanted to let you know that the repair status of your {1} (serial number: {2}) has been updated to: {3}.

You're receiving this message because your email address is linked to this repair.

Please note:
Quaffee does not operate a dedicated repair workshop. As a service to our coffee clients, we deliver machines to external partners, provide swap-out units when available, and apply a workshop fee plus a small admin charge.

Clients not regularly using our coffee may be charged additional fees for swap-out equipment or delivery — this is assessed on a case-by-case basis.

Warranty coverage is provided by the workshop directly — not Quaffee.
data.comment: Repair notification for linked contacts with machine details.

data.name: RepairStatusEmailSubject
data.value: Your Repair Status Has Changed
data.comment: Subject line for status notification email.

data.name: DisableClient.GoodbyeSubject
data.value: Coffee Checkup Reminders Disabled - We'll Miss You!

data.name: DisableClient.GoodbyeHeader
data.value: Coffee Checkup Reminders Disabled

data.name: DisableClient.GoodbyeMessage
data.value:
Hi there,

We've successfully disabled coffee checkup reminders for {0} as you requested.

data.name: DisableClient.GoodbyeWhatThisMeans
data.value:
📧 What this means:

  • You will no longer receive automated coffee checkup reminder emails
  • Your account remains active for manual orders
  • You can still contact us anytime for coffee orders

data.name: DisableClient.GoodbyeReenableInstructions
data.value:
🔄 Want to re-enable reminders?
Simply contact us at {1} and we'll be happy to turn them back on for you.

data.name: DisableClient.GoodbyeStillNeedCoffee
data.value:
☕ Still need great coffee?
Don't hesitate to reach out! We're always here to help with your coffee needs.

data.name: DisableClient.GoodbyeThankYou
data.value: Thank you for being part of the Quaffee family!

data.name: DisableClient.GoodbyeFooter
data.value:

Quaffee Coffee Roastery
Bringing you exceptional coffee since 2008
